item.description:
FUNNY BONE REGULARS - PLEASE KEEP AN EYE OUT FOR THE NEW PEOPLE AND HELP THEM GET SEATED AT OUR TABLES.

Wacky Wednesday At The Funny Bone Comedy Club

Buckland Hills Mall
Manchester, CT 06040
(860)-432-8600
www.HartfordFunnyBone.com

Admission is FREE every Wednesday Nite with a Funny Bone T-Shirt (T-Shirts cost $15)

Look for Our CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club Table Signs, and Join Us For A Great Nite Of Comedy!


Headliner: Steve Marshall

After graduating with a degree in accounting I decided to "Not Behave" and throw it all away to follow my childhood dream and become a COMEDIAN. By day I taught accounting, business law , math, and psychology at a vocational business school in Brooklyn, New York. By night I began the long haul of performing at "open mic" clubs learning to make people laugh. In 1999 I was picking up my dry cleaning and the "grandmotherly" woman handing me my cleaned shirt smiled and scolded me "behave!" And thats when it hit me. That was it. People love when I don't behave. I got on stage and began announcing "I'm not here to behave" and I started being honest about sex, ethnicity, my love life, the lack of respect for education, intelligence, minorities, women...even men. Yes men are direspected too.

Click Here For Details
